defs.name: copy
defs.value:
pub fn copy<P, Q>(P, Q, &CopyOptions) -> Result<u64> where P: AsRef<Path>,
Q: AsRef<Path>
defs.docs:
Copies the contents of one file to another. This function will also copy the permission
 bits of the original file to the destination file.

attributes.value: / Copies the contents of one file to another. This function will also copy the permission
/ bits of the original file to the destination file.
/ This function will return an error in the following situations, but is not limited to just
/ * This `from` path is not a file.
/ * The current process does not have the permission rights to access `from` or write `to`.
/ let options = CopyOptions::new(); //Initialize default values for CopyOptions

(P, bool) -> Result<()> where P: AsRef

/ but is not limited to just these cases:
/ * User lacks permissions to create directory at `path`.
/ create_all("/some/dir", false); // create directory some and dir
